title: Filter chips: UX classes do
code:
<gds-flex
  padding="xl"
  width="100%"
  justify-content="center"
  alig-items="center"
>
  <gds-filter-chips>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small" selected>Card purchase</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Direct debit</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Bankgiro or plusgiro</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small" selected>Swish</gds-filter-chip>
  </gds-filter-chips>
</gds-flex>
